extractions.description: The paper discusses the potential of detecting the Diffuse Supernova Neutrino Background (DSNB) at the Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory (JUNO) through the inverse-beta-decay (IBD) detection channel on free protons. Using the latest DSNB flux predictions, the study evaluates background suppression and optimization techniques aiming to achieve significant detection sensitivity.

title.value: Prospects for Detecting the Diffuse Supernova Neutrino Background with JUNO
title.justification: The title accurately reflects the main focus and objective of the paper.
title.quote: Prospects for Detecting the Diffuse Supernova Neutrino Background with JUNO

type.justification: The paper involves experimental setups, simulations, and evaluations based on empirical data and model predictions for DSNB detection.
type.quote: The detection potential for the diffuse supernova neutrino background (DSNB) at the Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory (JUNO), using the inverse-beta-decay (IBD) detection channel on free protons.

research_field.justification: The study uses deep learning-based techniques such as Boosted Decision Trees (BDT) for background suppression in the detection of DSNB in particle physics.
research_field.quote: There are different methods to implement the PSD technique in LS detectors, including the tail-to-total ratio (TTR) method [48], the multivariate machine learning technique with the Boosted Decision Tree (BDT) option [49], and the advanced Neural Network (NN) method [50].

sub_research_field.value: Deep Learning Applications in Neutrino Physics
sub_research_field.justification: The use of deep learning models like BDT and Neural Networks to optimize the sensitivity and background suppression in neutrino detection categorizes this study under applications of deep learning in neutrino physics.
sub_research_field.quote: There are different methods to implement the PSD technique in LS detectors, including the tail-to-total ratio (TTR) method [48], the multivariate machine learning technique with the Boosted Decision Tree (BDT) option [49], and the advanced Neural Network (NN) method [50].

name.justification: The model is explicitly mentioned as an advanced NN method using the Scikit-learn toolkit.
name.quote: The Scikit-learn toolkit [50] is used as an independent NN analysis.

type.justification: The paper refers to this model as a Neural Network implemented using Scikit-learn.
type.quote: The Scikit-learn toolkit [50] is used as an independent NN analysis.

name.justification: The model is specifically mentioned as one of the methods used for background suppression.
name.quote: The multivariate machine learning technique with the Boosted Decision Tree (BDT) option.
